name: wicked-elements
description: Components for the DOM as you've never seen before

scripts.build: npm run 3rd-parts && ascjs esm cjs && rollup --config rollup.config.js && npm run cleanup && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.size: cat min.js | gzip -9 | wc -c && cat min.js | brotli | wc -c
scripts.cleanup: cat index.js|sed 's/(exports)/()/'|sed 's/return exports;/return wickedElements;/'|sed -e 's/exports.*;//g'|sed 's/({})/()/'>index.clean&&mv index.clean index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
